Title: How to Avoid Career Stagnation
Description:
Effective leadership involves a commitment to personal development. Unless you continue to grow alongside your business, it will eventually outstrip you. Or worse, stagnate behind you. If you want to avoid that, join us now to explore the three behaviors of high-growth leaders.

Plus: We hear from Ray Edwards on the top five benefits of including reading in your personal development plan.

For more information, visit leadto.win.
